name: Detective Dachshund
description:
Detective Dachshund is a single player, text-based mystery game in which you play as a corgi helping the Detective solve the case of their missing plush toy in a rescue home. Will you find the toy, get caught by the humans, or meet other characters who may have stolen the plush? 

All assets created by: heyy_itsmaddy                                                                                                      

Rated: Everyone 10+                                                                                                                                            

Content Warning for: Mild Violence and Death

Thank you for playing and supporting Detective Dachshund! This game was made for the creators first ever Game Jam with a single person team! Enjoy! :)
